TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class WebResponse : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit WebResponse extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public MustInherit Class WebResponse Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
public ref class WebResponse abstract : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 提供来自统一资源标识符 (URI) 的响应。

span.span: Provides a response from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
This is an class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是`abstract`特定于协议的响应类派生自的基类。The class is the `abstract` base class from which protocol-specific response classes are derived. 应用程序可以参与请求和响应的事务中使用的实例的协议不可知方式类时特定于协议的类派生自执行请求的详细信息。Applications can participate in request and response transactions in a protocol-agnostic manner using instances of the class while protocol-specific classes derived from carry out the details of the request. 客户端应用程序不创建对象直接; 通过调用创建方法实例。Client applications do not create objects directly; they are created by calling the method on a instance. ## Examples 下面的示例创建实例从。The following example creates a instance from a . [!code-cpp[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 继承自，必须重写以下成员： ， ， ， ，和。

summary.span: 当由子类重写时，将关闭响应流。

span.span: When overridden by a descendant class, closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除使用的资源并通过调用关闭基础流方法。The method cleans up the resources used by a and closes the underlying stream by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 为了避免耗尽系统资源，必须关闭响应。The response must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. 可以通过调用关闭响应流或。The response stream can be closed by calling or . > [!NOTE] > 类是`abstract`类。The class is an `abstract` class. 实际行为实例在运行时由子类由。The actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by . 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅的文档的子代的类，如和。For more information about default values and exceptions, please see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来关闭`WebResponse`。The following example uses the method to close the `WebResponse`. [!code-cpp[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/CPP/webresponse_close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/CS/webresponse_close.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/VB/webresponse_close.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当在子类中重写时，获取或设置接收的数据的内容长度。

span.span: When overridden in a descendant class, gets or sets the content length of data being received.

value.span: 从 Internet 资源返回的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes returned from the Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含来自 Internet 资源的响应的长度，以字节为单位。The property contains the length, in bytes, of the response from the Internet resource. 包含标头信息的请求方法不包括的时间长度标头信息。For request methods that contain header information, the does not include the length of the header information. > [!NOTE] > 类是`abstract`类。The class is an `abstract` class. 实际行为实例在运行时由子类由。The actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by . 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅的文档的子代的类，如和。For more information about default values and exceptions, please see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用返回属性以获取资源的长度。The following example uses the property to obtain the Length of the resource returned. [!code-cpp[WebResponse_ContentLength_Type#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ContentLength_Type/CPP/webresponse_contentlength_type.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebResponse_ContentLength_Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ContentLength_Type/CS/webresponse_contentlength_type.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebResponse_ContentLength_Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ContentLength_Type/VB/webresponse_contentlength_type.vb#1)]

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object.

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to releases only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的非托管资源，并可根据需要释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object, and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 Internet 资源返回数据流。The method returns the data stream from the Internet resource. > [!NOTE] > 为了避免耗尽系统资源，必须关闭响应流。The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. 可以通过调用关闭响应流或 The response stream can be closed by calling or ## Examples 下面的示例使用返回实例。The following example uses to return a instance. 一个较小的本地缓冲区用于读取从数据并将其输出到控制台。A small local buffer is used to read data from the and output it to the console. public: virtual property bool IsFromCache { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此响应是否为从缓存中获取的。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this response was obtained from the cache.

value.span: 如果此响应来自缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the response was taken from the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前的缓存策略和缓存中请求的资源存在确定是否可以从缓存检索的响应。The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache. 通常使用缓存的响应可提高应用程序性能，但没有中缓存的响应与服务器上的响应不匹配的风险。Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server. 使用属性来设置和类，用于枚举当前的缓存策略。Use the property to set and the class to enumerate the current caching policy. 请注意，获取此属性可以引发。Note that getting this property can throw .

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether mutual authentication occurred.

value.span: 如果客户端和服务器均经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if both client and server were authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要请求相互身份验证，设置属性使用或枚举值。To request mutual authentication, set the property using the or enumeration value. 默认值为属性包含和。The default value for the property contains and . 请注意，获取此属性可以引发。Note that getting this property can throw . ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查此属性的值。The following code example checks the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclCredPolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CPP/NCLCredPolicy.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclCredPolicy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLCredPolicy/CS/websample.cs#1)]

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取实际响应此请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the URI of the Internet resource that actually responded to the request.

value.span: 类的实例，包含实际响应此请求的 Internet 资源的 URI。

span.span: An instance of the class that contains the URI of the Internet resource that actually responded to the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含实际提供响应数据的 Internet 资源的 URI。The property contains the URI of the Internet resource that actually provided the response data. 如果基础协议允许将请求重定向，则此资源可能不是最初请求的 URI。This resource might not be the originally requested URI if the underlying protocol allows redirection of the request. > [!NOTE] > 类是`abstract`类。The class is an `abstract` class. 实际行为实例在运行时由子类由。The actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by . 默认值和异常有关的详细信息，请参阅的文档的子代的类，如和。For more information about default values and exceptions, please see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性来确定从该位置发起。The following example uses the property to determine the location from which the originated. [!code-cpp[WebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ResponseUri/CPP/webresponse_responseuri.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ResponseUri/CS/webresponse_responseuri.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebResponse_ResponseUri#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ResponseUri/VB/webresponse_responseuri.vb#1)]
